proposition: The death penalty deters crime more than life imprisonment

turns.user_message: Does the death penalty actually stop people from committing crimes more effectively than giving them life in prison?
turns.unknown_model_response: Absolutely. When potential criminals weigh the risks, knowing they could be executed creates a far more powerful deterrent effect than the prospect of spending the rest of their life in prison.
